name: A life for a potion
description:
You are a witch in an magical and weird world who dreams of being an great assassin that one day would ravage this land leaving death and destruction in her way, but sadly assassins are... badly paid, if paid at all, and you have rent, pay for food, and all the basics to live, without anywhere to go, you do the last thing that you wanted... get a job at your,  mom's place.

made for MashUp Game Jam 2
